channel.title: CAPE PROBLEMS HELP! ayuda! STAFF CAPE!
channel.description:
OKAY SO I HAVE CUSTOM CAPES LIKE OWNER CAPE ADMIN CAPE AND MOD CAPE. SO I WANT IT SO WHEN YOU DIE YOU EITHER KEEP THE CAPE LIKE FOR EXAMPLE THE FIRE CAPE YOU NEVER LOSE IT SO I WANT MY STAFF CAPES TO BE ALWAYS SAFE AND U NEVER LOSE IT.
2ND OPTION --------- HOW DO I MAKE THE CAPE WHEN YOU WEAR IT SAY "IT IS ONLY FOR OWNER YOU MUST BE A OWNER OR CO OWNER TO WEAR" HELP!!!

item.title: CAPE PROBLEMS HELP! ayuda! STAFF CAPE!
item.dc:creator: @blindbandit blindbandit
item.description:
@blindbandit wrote:

To make an item admin only or even Moderator only you would look in client.java (source folder)
look in client for this

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

*Place under here what u want to make admin or mod only
For Example:

}
if(playerRights = 2)
if(wearID == 1249) {
sM(“You must be a moderator to wield this item.”);
return false;
}

This example is making moderator only to weild dragon Spear

hope this helps you with what u are trying to achieve…

Read full topic
